text: Malhuku aathekelhiye nsingi wo ishiri iyo yaari anareerihiye wo kila nikosho no malhuku o nhakhu mwinchi. Nsingi wo upacha waathekiye wo malhuku aneehaniya yaspi, wo nayelhi malhuku aneehaniya safaya yo kibuluu, wo neraru malhuku aneehaniya kalikedoni, wo necheshe malhuku aneehaniya zumaridi,
